description: Cluster designed for tagging OSINT artifacts with relevant strategic framework information. Specifically for Block-H, these tags are related to development and implementation of Cybersecurity continious operataions policy and procedure.
name: HITRUST CSF - Business Continuity

values.description: Requirements are determined for information security and the continuity of information security management in adverse situations, e.g. during a crisis or disaster.
values.value: OSRS HITRUST CSF Business Continuity: 13.a Planning Information Security Continuity
